backend/main.mo: Defines Motoko actor with many data types and stores for documents, model stats, gender/location distributions, cleaning logs, and functions for managing logs and resetting data.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence values.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend components, pages, hooks, and utilities for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and applies base styles to body and elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx and mounts it into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, global theme provider, header/footer layout, and mounts all main pages.
frontend/src/components/BrandEmotionChar: Computes and displays per-brand emotion distributions using mock analysis, sanitized chart data, and visualization state handling.
frontend/src/components/CleaningLogPanel: Displays latest cleaning logs with status icons, expandable panel, and loading state handling.
frontend/src/components/ConfusionMatrixC: Renders a validated confusion matrix heatmap with dynamic coloring, emotion labels, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/EmotionChart.tsx: Shows a static bar chart visualizing predefined emotion frequencies.
frontend/src/components/EmotionDistribut: Computes emotion distribution from documents and displays a pie chart with fallback states.
frontend/src/components/EnsembleComparis: Visualizes precision, recall, F1, and accuracy for three ensemble models using a radar chart with tooltips.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright text and a link.
frontend/src/components/GenderEmotionCha: Displays gender-based emotion distribution using a bar chart with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/GeoEmotionMap.ts: Filters and validates Indonesian location-based emotion data, then renders a geographic emotion intensity map with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Defines the top navigation header with theme toggle, navigation buttons, and a mobile menu drawer.
frontend/src/components/IntentionBrandCo: Displays a stacked bar chart showing purchase intention levels grouped by brand using fetched correlation data.
frontend/src/components/IntentionDemogra: Builds gender and regional demographic bar charts using derived purchase intention distributions.
frontend/src/components/IntentionTrendCh: Generates a multi-line time series chart showing historical purchase intention trends by level.
frontend/src/components/MarketingRadarCh: Computes marketing metrics from documents and visualizes them in a radar chart with dataset and validation handling.
frontend/src/components/ModelPerformance: Renders a bar chart comparing model precision, recall, and F1-score, with percentage validation and an empty-state message when no dataset is active.
frontend/src/components/PsychoSocialHeat: Generates a psycho-social heatmap from document metrics with validation and fallback UI when data is missing or insufficient.
frontend/src/components/PurchaseIntentio: Displays a pie chart of purchase intention distribution using fetched data, showing an empty state when values are unavailable.
frontend/src/components/RecentAnalysis.t: Shows the five most recent analyzed documents with mock emotion results or a placeholder when no documents exist.
frontend/src/components/TemporalEvolutio: Builds a line chart showing emotional trends over grouped time periods using mock analysis results.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching, uploading, and deleting documents, including triggering backend processing and invalidating caches.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS theme variables, base styles, dark mode settings, and print-specific styles.
frontend/src/lib/marketingMetrics.ts: Computes marketing funnel metrics from document text using keyword-based scoring and averaging across documents.
frontend/src/lib/mockData.ts: Provides mock brand detection and mock emotion analysis utilities for frontend simulations.
frontend/src/lib/psychoSocialMetrics.ts: Computes emotion categories and psycho-social dimension scores for documents based on deterministic keyword rules.
frontend/src/lib/strategicReport.ts: Generates strategic reports by analyzing emotions, brand mentions, psycho-social metrics, and marketing metrics from documents.
frontend/src/lib/visualizationState.ts: Provides utilities for determining visualization state and sanitizing numeric data, including safe array access and emotion label normalization.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AnalysisPage.tsx: Implements the emotion analysis page with dataset filtering, document management, and multiple emotion-based visualizations.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Provides the main dashboard for uploading text or files, triggering analysis, and previewing high-level emotion insights.
frontend/src/pages/MetricsPage.tsx: Displays model and ensemble performance metrics with confusion matrices, tracking dataset changes and model selection.
frontend/src/pages/PurchaseIntentionPage: Shows purchase intention analytics derived from documents, including stats and correlation visualizations.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: React settings page allowing users to toggle transformer models, configure ensemble defaults, and adjust analysis parameters with save feedback.
frontend/src/pages/StrategicRecommendati: Page that loads documents, generates a strategic report, supports markdown export and printing, and displays report metadata and recommendations.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and container settings, with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file describing visualization and reporting features, known rendering issues, and build requirements for dashboard and strategic report functionality.
